meanings.definition: Notes added to a text or diagram to explain, comment on, or provide references.
meanings.sent1: I always make annotations in my textbook to help me understand better.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to add annotations to our essays for clarity.
meanings.sent3: My friend's annotations in his notebook are so detailed, they look like a mini dictionary!
meanings.sent4: Her annotations in the margins of the book were like little gems of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The colorful annotations in the textbook made studying more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: The act of annotating or adding notes to a text or diagram.
meanings.sent1: The annotations in the margins helped me remember important points.
meanings.sent2: During the lecture, I focused on the annotations in my notebook.
meanings.sent3: His annotations were so messy that they looked like a secret code!
meanings.sent4: The annotations on the map guided us through the forest like a treasure map.
meanings.sent5: I found her annotations on the recipe very helpful when cooking.
